text:
AUSTIN

I had a great time at your wonderful Airstream. It had everything I needed to have to get work done and sleep a table to do computer work/check e-mails on and a bed to sleep. Everything was comfortable and relaxing. October in Austin was a nice time to attend a conference (between ACL weekends and not SXSW).

Rene and Thomas made it easy for me to get into the Airstream even though my arrival time changed a bit.

It's far enough out of the city to be relaxing and still close enough to be downtown in about 15 minutes.

I would stay here a again next time I'm in Austin.
title: Mod Retro Airstream Heart of Austin
